data.text:
Several days after the Selection Race―― 
Grass Wonder's physical and mental condition were superb.
data.processed:
<story>Several days after the Selection Race―― 
<story>Grass Wonder's physical and mental condition were superb.

data.text: She had been approached by quite a few trainers.
data.processed: <story>She had been approached by quite a few trainers.

data.text:
Today, as I walked down this tree-lined road, 
I saw that Grass Wonder was being scouted, but――
data.processed:
<story>Today, as I walked down this tree-lined road, 
<story>I saw that Grass Wonder was being scouted, but――

data.text:
I apologize for the inconvenience but…… 
I'll have to politely decline.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I apologize for the inconvenience but…… 
<story>I'll have to politely decline.

data.text:
B-but why!? If there are any problems with my instructions, 
please tell me! I'll be sure to revise it!!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>B-but why!? If there are any problems with my instructions, 
<story>please tell me! I'll be sure to revise it!!

data.text:
I'm very happy that you're willing to go that far. 
However…… I'm sorry.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I'm very happy that you're willing to go that far. 
<story>However…… I'm sorry.

data.text:
But for now, I am rejecting scouting 
offers from all trainers.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>But for now, I am rejecting scouting 
<story>offers from all trainers.

data.text: I see…… That's very unfortunate…… but I understand.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed: <story>I see…… That's very unfortunate…… but I understand.

data.text:
The veteran trainer's shoulders 
drooped as she walked away……
data.processed:
<story>The veteran trainer's shoulders 
<story>drooped as she walked away……

data.text: Oh? Well, you're……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Oh? Well, you're……

data.text: Are you, perhaps, wanting to talk about scouting?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You don't plan on accepting though?
You don't plan on accepting though?

data.processed: <story>Are you, perhaps, wanting to talk about scouting?

data.text: Yes…… I apologize for that.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Yes…… I apologize for that.

data.text:
Um, but please don't misunderstand, okay? 
It's not that I'm uneasy about Trainer-san.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Um, but please don't misunderstand, okay? 
<story>It's not that I'm uneasy about Trainer-san.

data.text: I suppose you could say this is a personal problem.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>I suppose you could say this is a personal problem.

data.text:
Yes. Well then…… 
I'm sorry, but you'll have to excuse me.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Yes. Well then…… 
<story>I'm sorry, but you'll have to excuse me.

data.text:
Grass Wonder…… poor girl. 『A personal problem』 
is what she said but, it might be because she 
doesn't have a competitive personality.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Grass Wonder…… poor girl. 『A personal problem』 
<story>is what she said but, it might be because she 
<story>doesn't have a competitive personality.

data.text:
With a calm and laid back demeanor, even if she debuts, 
you don't think she'll want to compete against the others?
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>With a calm and laid back demeanor, even if she debuts, 
<story>you don't think she'll want to compete against the others?

data.text:
Hmmm, if she doesn't have the drive to win, 
then it would be a little difficult, huh……
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm, if she doesn't have the drive to win, 
<story>then it would be a little difficult, huh……

data.text:
Before long, that was the rumor that 
started spreading amongst the trainers……
data.processed:
<story>Before long, that was the rumor that 
<story>started spreading amongst the trainers……

data.text:
And then one day―― I happened to see Grass Wonder and 
El Condor Pasa doing some parallel running training.
data.processed:
<story>And then one day―― I happened to see Grass Wonder and 
<story>El Condor Pasa doing some parallel running training.

data.text:
Huuu. Thanks for tagging along, Grass! 
I think I'm just about done for today.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Huuu. Thanks for tagging along, Grass! 
<story>I think I'm just about done for today.

data.text:
Is that so? Good work. 
I think I'll run for a little bit more.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Is that so? Good work. 
<story>I think I'll run for a little bit more.

data.text: I want to do just a bit more stamina training.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>I want to do just a bit more stamina training.

data.text:
Eh, stamina? I think Grass has already 
built up quite a bit already though?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Eh, stamina? I think Grass has already 
<story>built up quite a bit already though?

data.text: That's not true…… I still have a long way to go.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>That's not true…… I still have a long way to go.

data.text:
That last step…… when my stamina is about to run out on the 
last straight. I want to be able to take that last step.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>That last step…… when my stamina is about to run out on the 
<story>last straight. I want to be able to take that last step.

data.text: Hmmmm～～～～～mmm……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Hmmmm～～～～～mmm……

data.text: ……What is it, El?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……What is it, El?

data.text:
No, nothing. ……So you really 
don't plan on accepting any scouts?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>No, nothing. ……So you really 
<story>don't plan on accepting any scouts?

data.text:
Oh, my…… Fufufu, geez El. 
We've had this conversation many times before.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, my…… Fufufu, geez El. 
<story>We've had this conversation many times before.

data.text:
If you're going to forget it so easily, maybe I should etch it 
directly in to your forehead～? 『I won't accept』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>If you're going to forget it so easily, maybe I should etch it 
<story>directly in to your forehead～? 『I won't accept』

data.text:
Waitwaitwait, spare me from that! 
And why would you put it on MY forehead!?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Waitwaitwait, spare me from that! 
<story>And why would you put it on MY forehead!?

data.text:
Okay, okay. Anyways, 
that's how it is, so let's leave it at that～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Okay, okay. Anyways, 
<story>that's how it is, so let's leave it at that～.

data.text: Hmmmm～mm?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Hmmmm～mm?

data.text:
……Well, it's a funny story, don't you think? 
Grass, do you know what the trainers are saying about you?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>……Well, it's a funny story, don't you think? 
<story>Grass, do you know what the trainers are saying about you?

data.text:
『She's not being scouted because she lacks fighting spirit…… 
her calm and gentle demeanor isn't suited for races!』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>『She's not being scouted because she lacks fighting spirit…… 
<story>her calm and gentle demeanor isn't suited for races!』

data.text:
……that's what they're saying! Naa haa ha! 
Man～, it's amazing how little they know, huh!?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>……that's what they're saying! Naa haa ha! 
<story>Man～, it's amazing how little they know, huh!?

data.text: After all, Grass is really――
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>After all, Grass is really――

data.text:
……Ellll～? If you're energetic enough to keep talking, 
maybe you'd like to join me for a bit more training?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……Ellll～? If you're energetic enough to keep talking, 
<story>maybe you'd like to join me for a bit more training?

data.text:
Let's see, how about some stretches first? 
I'll help you get a reeeeeeeeaaaaaally good full body stretch.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Let's see, how about some stretches first? 
<story>I'll help you get a reeeeeeeeaaaaaally good full body stretch.

data.text: Hii-!?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Hii-!?

data.text:
Ah, I really need to get going. If I stay here any longer, 
I feel like I'm heading straight for a Romero Special……!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I really need to get going. If I stay here any longer, 
<story>I feel like I'm heading straight for a Romero Special……!!

data.text: I bid you adieuuuuu!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>I bid you adieuuuuu!!

data.text: Oh geez, El.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Oh geez, El.

data.text: ……rather than that, I need to work on my stamina.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……rather than that, I need to work on my stamina.

data.text: So it won't happen again――
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>So it won't happen again――

data.text: So I won't falter again.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>So I won't falter again.

data.text:
Saying that to herself and then running off, 
Grass Wonder still looked as calm as usual. However――
data.processed:
<story>Saying that to herself and then running off, 
<story>Grass Wonder still looked as calm as usual. However――

data.text: Her blue eyes seemed to be burning with determination.
data.processed: <story>Her blue eyes seemed to be burning with determination.
